This awful effort just goes to show what happens when you not only use computers to generate the effects, but also let them devise the plot and write the script. This should serve as a warning to all filmmakers: allow your programs to figure out everything and toss the pictures and story out the window for uninspired -- and occasionally just ugly -- computer animation. The total absence of discernible story or even minimal plot mechanics make the whole tedious effort difficult to watch, if not impossible.
